description: Model produces unequal outcomes across groups
controls: Bias testing, dataset review, fairness metrics

description: Model outputs expose personal or sensitive data
AI generates misleading or election-sensitive content
controls: Content moderation rules, human review escalation
Authentication, rate limiting, logging and monitoring

description: Users cannot understand or contest AI decisions
controls: Model documentation, explanation interface, human review

description: Staff rely on AI outputs without verification
Third-party AI providers mishandle data or fail compliance
controls: Vendor due diligence checklist, contractual safeguards

description: Poor or biased datasets degrade model performance
controls: Data validation, schema enforcement, dataset versioning
